channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The AI Smart City: Hype Or Hope For 2025?
item.description: The smart city of 2025 is a powerful construct that, if used with intention, can improve outcomes for millions of people.

item.title: Honesty about better

item.title: Dangerously Smart: Russia’s Independent Attack Drone Developers
item.description: Russia's state drone industry are slow and inefficient. But small startups are producing simple, low-cost attack drones to meet demand.

item.title: Lulled
item.description: Selfish is easy. Short term is easy. Complacent is easy. Turning our head and ignoring the problem is easy. Going along to get along is easy. But easy...

item.title: Destiny 2’s New List Of ‘Heresy’ Exotic Buffs Is Looking Great
item.description: There are a load of exotic weapon and armor buffs coming to Destiny 2 in the next episode. Here they are, in full.

item.title: An Update About ‘The Night Agent’ Season 3 On Netflix
item.description: Is The Night Agent getting a season 3 on Netflix? There's already a good amount of information on that front right after season 2 release here.
